name: Hanse Haus
description:
Since 1929, HANSE HAUS have been turning their customers dreams of their own home into reality, building more than 30,000 houses in the process. While style and architecture may vary significantly from one home to the next, all have one thing in common: outstanding high energy efficiency that translate to minimal heating costs and maximum home comfort.

HANSE HAUS pride themselves on exacting building standards, a fast, efficient build schedule, a huge range of fittings and interiors and the security offered by working with a strong, established company.

In HANSE HAUS, you will find an ideal partner and specialist in the field of prefabricated home building and ultra-high efficiency Passivhaus construction.
